---
name: diagrams-refresh
description: Regenerate deterministic architecture and frontend diagrams from source docs.
argument-hint: [diagram_scope(optional)]
user-invokable: true
disable-model-invocation: false
---

# Diagrams Refresh

Use deterministic generation actions:

- `mcp.action.generate_diagrams`
- `mcp.action.generate_frontend_diagrams`

Then verify outputs are present in generated diagram paths.
